actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to provide for loans to small business concerns seriously affected by shortages of energy producing materials, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides, under the Small Business Act, for loans to small business concerns seriously affected by shortages of energy producing materials.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to provide for loans to small business concerns seriously affected by shortages of energy producing materials, and for other purposes.
